mapper.insert: insert into zhufeng_user (id, name, password, sex, email, phone, department_id, job_id, description, time, state) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sex,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{departmentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{jobId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{time,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{state,jdbcType=TINYINT})
mapper.update: update zhufeng_user set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sex = #{sex,jdbcType=TINYINT}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, department_id = #{departmentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, job_id = #{jobId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, time = #{time,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, state = #{state,jdbcType=TINYINT} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, name, password, sex, email, phone, department_id, job_id, description, time, state from zhufeng_user where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select id, name, password, sex, email, phone, department_id, job_id, description, time, state from zhufeng_user
